## Tipe Data

R memiliki 5 tipe data yaitu

- Character
- Numeric (real or decimal)
- Integer
- Logical
- Complex


### Numeric

```{r}
num <- 1.2
class(num)
```

### Integer

```{r}
int <- 2L
class(int)
```

### Character

```{r}
char <- "datacamp"
class(char)
```

### Logical

```{r}
log_true <- TRUE
class(log_true)
```

### Complex

```{r}
complex = 4 + 3i
class(complex)
```
